snippet: Interviews with pregnant women in Ghana, which has a high rate of stillbirths, suggest that those who slept on their sides had a lower risk of stillbirth.
lead_paragraph: Interviews with pregnant women in Ghana, which has a high rate of stillbirths, suggest that those who slept on their sides had a lower risk of stillbirth.

headline.seo: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth
headline.main: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth
headline.print_headline: Side Sleeping May Reduce Risk of Stillbirth
